name: Please Stand By -I Got Something To Say 058
description: Please Stand By utilizes the iconic SMPTE color bars template and changes the palette to bring into question viewers perceptions surrounding "standards of color." An offshoot of my original series, I Got Something To Say, adds an additional more literal message. Please Stand By, Till All Are One. The motto of Optimus and the Autobots and a motto I think the world should be looking towards, everyone coming together to help one another. Optimus Prime Color Palette
